source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Model a Low Polygon Character in Autodesk Maya 2018

visible_instructors.name: Eric
visible_instructors.title: Eric Kunzendorf
visible_instructors.job_title: Associate Professor of Animation at Jacksonville University

items.headline: Creating a character using 2k poly or less
objectives_summary: Set up a character schematic in the modeling workspace.
Model characters using simple cylinders and extrusions
Model hands using cubes and cylinders

items.title: Complex clothes in 1 hour (Marvelous Designer+3ds max)
items.headline: Series of video-lectures how to easily and in 1hour create  clothes for character using 3ds max and MD.
objectives_summary: Create complex clothes for your character in short time!
Get best knowledges of Marvelous Designer!
Visualize your characters in the best perfomance!

items.title: Rigging and Animating Low Poly FPS Arms in Blender
items.headline: Learn how to rig and animate low poly style FPS arms from scratch using Blender 2.9.
objectives_summary: Creating advanced rigs in Blender 2.9
3D Animation in Blender 2.9
Animation basics and theory

items.title: The Complete Maya Course: Learn 3D Modeling With Examples
items.headline: Learn How to Easily Create High-Quality 3D Realistic Models & Textures in Autodesk Maya
objectives_summary: Learn how to create this 3D model in Maya and start creating 3D assets for games and film
Understand Maya modelling tools and start creating 3D models fast and efficiently
UV map and unwrap your 3D models

items.title: Character Design for Concept Art
items.headline: how to draw characters, how to create concept art for animation or games
objectives_summary: You will learn the professional way to create character designs and concept art
You'll learn how to come up with ideas for character designs, how to draw characters out of your head easily at any time
You'll learn the proportions of the human figure, how to draw the human figure in any pose, plus how to draw the face and draw the face in any angle

items.title: 3D ANIMATION: WALK and RUN CYCLE
items.headline: Learn to Animate a Standard Walk and Run Cycle in Maya Quickly and Effectively.
objectives_summary: Animate  an effective walk and run cycle and create variations.
Animate faster in Maya

items.title: Fusion 360 3D Modeling Course
items.headline: Learn to 3D Model in Fusion 360 like a Pro!
objectives_summary: Basic to Advanced Modeling techniques
Block-out model using basic shapes and forms
How to create sketches

items.title: Learn 3D Modelling & Animation from Scratch with Blender 3D

visible_instructors.name: Richard
visible_instructors.title: Richard Sneyd
visible_instructors.job_title: Game Design Lecturer, Founder & CEO of CyberMyth Games

items.headline: Zero to hero guide on learning how to model, texture, animate and render your own 3D models and scenes in Blender 3D.
objectives_summary: Model 3D objects with ease using Blender
Use advance vertex, edge and polygon selection and editing techniques
Import and utilize reference images

items.title: Rigging and Animating PSDs in Moho Pro
items.headline: Rig and animate image based characters designed in other software
objectives_summary: Properly Rig a Character
Create Bone Dynamics that Link to a Smart Warp Mesh
Apply Subtle Head Turns with Smart Actions

items.title: Understanding Substance Painter Volume 2 All Levels!
items.headline: A Focus Intensive Course in learning AND practicing Substance Painter with included 3D Model as shown!
objectives_summary: - Review of the UI basics and map baking process of 2018 - 2019 Substance Painter
- Explore and experiment how to combine smart materials together through masks and how to edit their properties to obtain different resulting outcomes
- Utilizing paint layers for stenciling details in the with course supplied customized height maps for precision details

items.title: ZBrush Course - Creating Game of Thrones Style Panel Art

visible_instructors.name: UK Online
visible_instructors.title: UK Online Training Centre
visible_instructors.job_title: Online training centre based in the UK creative studies

items.headline: Learn how to model hardsurface and organic scultping in ZBrush with this Game of Thrones inspired course
objectives_summary: Be able to work with Zbrush more confidently
Understand how to create base meshes in Zbrush
Learn how to use the hardsurface tools in ZBrush

items.title: Getting started in mO2 - A Plugin for Apple Motion 5

visible_instructors.name: James
visible_instructors.title: James Rickards
visible_instructors.job_title: Apple Pro Certified Trainer & Motion Graphics Artist

items.headline: Learn how to use this amazing Plugin from MotionVFX  - Build a 3D Gallery and use your own images
objectives_summary: How to use the mO2 plugin
Learn mO2's new interface
Build a 3D gallery

items.title: VFX Compositing & Visual Effects: After Effects Tutorials
items.headline: Learn to create VFX Compositing & Visual Effects like Hollywood through After Effects tutorials using any phone/Camera
objectives_summary: VFX Compositing in Adobe After Effects.
To use Adobe After Effects for any kind of VFX (Visual Effects).
To create VFX shots for your any kind of videos at home in very low budget using any cell phone or camera and Adobe After Effects.

items.title: BlendMasters Vol. 2: Shading and Lighting a Car in Cycles
items.headline: Learn to create photo-realistic shaders and lighting with Cycles inside Blender as we render the car from volume one.
objectives_summary: Create basic to intermediate level complexity shaders in the Cycles rendering engine.
Create a fully realistic studio lighting setup without the need for HDRIs.
Understand how to optimize render settings for Cycles depending on your needs to speed things up.

items.title: Learn to Make Realistic PBR Materials in Substance Designer
items.headline: Beginners Guide to Creating Realistic PBR Materials using Substance Designer
objectives_summary: Understand how Materials Work
Leverage 4 Channels to Create Realistic Materials: BaseColor - Normal - Roughness - Metallic
Learn Nodes and their Effects that Allows you to Create any Material that you Want

items.title: Maya 2017 - Create Pixar cartoon scene using Arnold and Maya
items.headline: Learn advance 3D lighting, rendering high quality using Arnold renderer and Maya by creating Pixar cartoon scene
objectives_summary: Build the strong portfolio for 3D career
Using the plugin and tool for modeling as in production
Save time and money by creating your own 3D scene, quickly and efficiently.
